Index >  RemoveAllSelectedImages

RemoveAllSelectedImages()

Description

Removes all selected images.

Syntax

.RemoveAllSelectedImages();

Return value

bool

true indicates success. false indicates failure.

When false is returned, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

SelectedImagesCount
SetSelectedImageIndex

Example

//This will remove the 2nd and 3rd images
DWObject.SelectedImagesCount = 2;
for(var i = 0; i < 2; i++){
    DWObject.SetSelectedImageIndex(i,i + 1);
}
DWObject.RemoveAllSelectedImages();
